selectExercise.title:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the modal to select an exercise for mentoring.
**UI Location**: Request Mentoring Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When a user clicks to request mentoring for a solution.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Select an exercise to request mentoring on"
selectExercise.searchPlaceholder:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for the search input.
**UI Location**: Request Mentoring Modal (search bar)
**When Users See This**: When the modal is open, before the user types into the search box.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Search exercise by name"
exercise.numberOfIterations:
**Functional Purpose**: Alt text for an icon indicating the number of iterations for a solution.
**UI Location**: Request Mentoring Modal (exercise list item)
**When Users See This**: When an exercise solution is displayed in the list and the icon is hovered or read by a screen reader.
**Technical Context**: Standard text.
**Current English**: "Number of iterations"
